title: BI ANALYST REQUIRED - QSR INDUSTRY
description: We are seeking a Business Analyst with strong expertise in Microsoft BI and SQL, combined with the ability to drive ICT strategy and compliance across our store network. This is not just a back-office reporting role – it requires hands-on leadership in stores, bridging digital skills, and ensuring our teams are equipped for a 100% digital brand environment. The successful candidate will split time between analytical/reporting responsibilities and ICT operations management, including 50% store visits each month, ensuring all stores are visited within a two-month cycle.
responsibilities: Develop, maintain, and optimize Microsoft BI dashboards and reports for operational and financial insights
Write, manage, and optimize SQL queries and stored procedures for accurate, timely business reporting
Partner with Finance, Operations, and HR to translate business requirements into BI solutions
Perform advanced data analysis to identify risks, opportunities, and efficiency improvements
Ensure automation and integrity of reporting processes, providing 365-day visibility of KPIs
Drive ICT policies and ensure compliance across all stores and support functions
Manage ICT support contracts and relationships with technology service providers
Visit 50% of stores monthly to bridge ICT skills gaps among Store Managers and teams
Ensure correct usage of ICT dashboards and reports for operational improvement
Verify compliance with ICT policies and digital standards
Work closely with Operations to improve the store work environment, reduce inefficiencies, and enhance customer experience through digital tools
qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Information Systems, Computer Science, Business Analytics, or related field
3–5 years' experience as a Business Analyst, BI Developer, or ICT-focused operations role
Advanced expertise in Microsoft Power BI (dashboards, DAX, Power Query) and SQL
Strong understanding of ICT operations, compliance, and vendor management
Excellent problem-solving, communication, and training skills
Experience in the retail, QSR, or FMCG sector is an advantage
